summary.span: Resumes a workflow from a bookmark asynchronously using the specified bookmark, value, callback method, and user-provided state data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要判斷繼續作業是否成功，請呼叫 。To determine if the resume operation was successful, call . 可以從回呼方法之內或之外呼叫。 can be called from inside or outside of the callback method. 如果在繼續作業完成之前呼叫 ，它會封鎖直到繼續作業完成為止。If is called before the resume operation completes, it blocks until the resume operation completes.
